top_comments_top.body: Grid is a very decent game. Burnout Remastered gives excellent nostalgia. Forza Horizon is a beautiful racing sim with a nice touch of arcade! I also enjoyed Need For Speed Heat and NFS Hot Pursuit Remastered also give me a sweet kiss of nostalgia. Hopefully these games are on PS4 as I’m a Xbox player myself, I hope this helps friend!

I need ones as well but I hate the realistic ones
Like give me items!!!
Crash nitro racing? There are a few kart games on PS4.
The crew 2, Gran Turismo, dirt rally 2.0
